msg: Closing an opened resource in a XalanC sample. Reviewed by Matthew Hoyt

author: mhoyt
msg: Fix to enable build on BC++B6

author: mhoyt
msg: Fix to delay pushing context marker for direct template calls until "getFirstChildElemToExecute" is invoked.
Without this change,  an AVT that belongs literal result elements that contains a single <xsl:call-template ...> element would fail to resolve if it referred to a local variable.

author: mhoyt
msg: Fix to properly reset/initialize array of pointers (causes assertion on z/OS)
